message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40.  It's important to settle this early because the value decreases over time.
I think we can both do better. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need more than $40. Let's find a compromise.
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing.  I'll take a little less this round, $55, and you get $45.  Let's close this deal!
